column1: #Text=Why do they need to be compensated?
#Text=When that happens something that once had value might not in the future.
#Text=If you purchase a house or stock in an oil company, you are not guaranteed its value in perpetuity.
#Text=These people made a speculative investment and are now trying to suggest it was a guarantee.
#Text=I don't suspect that the city ever made any guarantees about the value of taxi plates.
